title: My kills are shown in red.
body:
Recently I have been playing and I have noticed that every time when I get a kill it will show "You have slain an enemy". it has a colored underline that  shows in blue, and for some reason mine shows as red. I have no idea why it's doing that. I have tried everything in the settings and it won't go away.
Should I uninstall my league of legends or is there something else? This thing is kind of annoying.
Help me!

replies.body:
I'm not entirely sure what your seeing. Can you screenshot it and upload it to [Imgur](https://imgur.com/) so you can link it to me?

You can do this by slapping F12, then finding the screenshot in the following directory:  **(C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Screenshots)**
